meta.description: Go get more with our free email newsletter! https://buff.ly/2BCo9qF Dr. Robert Rowen gives his opinion on the current vaccination schedule and whether or not he would vaccinate them today if he had that option. Learn his opinion on possible vaccine ingredients and what might happen when they combine with other chemicals and what that may lead to. Are these things we really don't know when it comes to vaccinations?

title: What This Doctor Thinks About this Year's Most Controversial Topic
cleaned_text:
Go get more with our free email newsletter! https://buff.ly/2BCo9qF

Dr. Robert Rowen gives his opinion on the current vaccination schedule and whether or not he would vaccinate them today if he had that option. Learn his opinion on possible vaccine ingredients and what might happen when they combine with other chemicals and what that may lead to. Are these things we really don't know when it comes to vaccinations?
